# The `ErrorInfoBase` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Base class for error info classes.

Do not extend this directly: Extend the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfo">ErrorInfo</a> template subclass instead.

Definition at line 45 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#aba585267e9b297fe07c79038262fe88c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual std::error&#95;code llvm::ErrorInfoBase::convertToErrorCode () const</>}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h/#l00064">64</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
